Service Details: - Provides a safe non-judgmental counselling group for women exploring abuse and unhealthy patterns in partner relationships from childhood- Topics are varied, and can include breaking the cycle, deciding whether/how to leave or stay in a relationship, boundaries, anger, trust, anxiety, depression, parenting, developing healthier present day relationships and healing and thriving after abuse
Dates: - Fridays from 9:30am - 11:30am- New participants can join any week, but are asked to come at 9:00am for paperwork and orientation
Address & Map: 347 Leon Ave, #204Kelowna, BC     V1Y 8C7View MapQuest Map
